data.message: Ever since I got the change, my FB is exceedingly slow and the pages freeze. i get a message asking me if I want to kill the page or wait. it is driving me nuts. Lots of my friends are having the same issue.

replies.message: NO,,, Leave things alone!  It's slower than ever & very hard to see.  Only 2 posts visible with this new stupid format!  Stop fixing things that are not broken!  Fix what needs fixing & leave everything else alone!
ditto.
No matter what U do some People R just not Happy. & don't like nothing....JS.
I really don't like it

please leave f/b alone, it used to be fun getting on it and seeing all the local things wherever one lives. Why is it so slow now, won't scroll, puts things on it that I never ask for. You have made f/b etc not worth signing on to.  ENOUGH IS ENOUGH AND THAT IS IT.
I get kicked off.
I've been having hot flashes since the change.
Every time you make a new change my page gets harder and harder to read. Pretending you are asking our opinion doesn't help either
yep same thing here
Mine's been doing that since before the new changes. If it continues to be that slow, I'm going to spend less time on here. Hm... maybe a good thing!
Mine is slow too. I switched to a different browser and that helped.

Those that are having speed issues with FB, are you using Internet Explorer or Google Chrome.  I found long ago, that FB works much faster & with NO freeze ups if you use Chrome as your FB browser.  I've also noticed that it does work better with Internet Explorer 11 than with older versions.  However, if you're still using Windows XP instead of Windows 7 or 8, you can't use a newer browser than Internet Explorer 9.  In that case, try using Google Chrome.
I thought it was just because my of my crappy internet! Glad it isn't just me even if I don't like it either!
Even with Chrome, it is becoming increasingly sluggish.  Facebook is allowing ads to encroach more and more on the ease and usability of the users.
I don't like the change... You can'
Mine is the same way Rochelle Davis Barcellona...pages won't load and it freezes all the time. It worked fine before this new change.
Same here!
Same here.
I'm having the same problems.
I dont like it
